transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Namaskar sir.
Customer: Ha sir bol rahe the?
Executive: Lakshman baat kar raha tha sir, IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Ha sir, hello.
Executive: Ji sir, aapse sir pehle baat hui thi sir. Hello. Aapne video ko video meet ke liye bola tha mujhe.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ha sir.
Customer: Ha boliye Lakshman ji.
Executive: Sir aapse pehle baat hui thi sir, to aapse pucha tha video meet pe connect hone ke liye bol rahe the.
Customer: Barabar hai, barabar hai, par kya hai mera idhar election duty chal raha hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: To uske vajah se abhi thoda busy chal raha hai mera, bahut busy chal raha hai.
Executive: Nahi, wo to thik hai sir, lekin na aapki aapki taraf se na ek hello hai, meri company ka timing se 8 ghanta hai, usko bhi to 24 24 ghanta kar diya hai isliye ho nahi raha hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Nahi, nahi wo to thik hai sir, lekin na mujhe aapse ek concern tha.
Customer: Aap sir aap aap ek do lead consume kar lijiye sir jiski vajah se aap aapka jo ticket hai na sir wo raise ho gaya hai.
Customer: Sir ek minute, wo ticket mein kal mein kal hai na mein kal travel mein hu mein. Sir aapka mein dekh sakta hu, aapka message dekha maine.
Executive: Achcha sir.
Customer: To sir, at least sir ek do ek do leads use kar lijiye to sir aap aapko kuch kuch message karte ho, kuch call karte ho.
Executive: Sir thik hai sir, koi dikkat nahi hai sir, lekin kal kab connect ho payega sir?
Customer: Ha ho payega, ho payega, kal to udhar hi hu mein, Mumbai mein hu, kal call kar dunga mein.
Executive: Chalo thik hai sir, kal connect karte hai fir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to connect due to election duty.

- Ticket raised due to not consuming leads.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to consume one or two leads.

- Customer will connect tomorrow from Mumbai.



Next Steps: 

- Connect tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meet, ticket, connect
